system.description:
A 1â€™ long, hollow metal tube which has the power to open bonds, locks, portals, etc. when sounded.

  • Opening: Each time the chime is sounded and left to ring for one minute, one portal, lock, lid, bar, etc. (as selected by the user), is caused to open.

  • Noise: There is a [[/br 1d6]]{1-in-6} chance of wandering monsters being attracted each time the chime is sounded.

  • Magical locks: Hold portal and wizard lock spells are negated (the latter only if cast by a character below 9th level).

  • Charges: After being sounded [[/r 4d20]] times, the chime shatters.
